contributionDescription: Optimism can be defined by hope and confidence. It is a mental state or a mindset that believes that there is hope in the future and that that hope in the future gives them confidence. They are confident in their ability to succeed, maybe not right now, but in the future.
impactDescription: my contribution to the Optimism Collective is that I do my best to keep optimism strong and use it from the last installment.And one day optimism will become a powerful exchange platform. They are confident in their ability to succeed, maybe not right now, but in the future.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for promises of future impact. The applicant states they will "do their best to keep optimism strong" and "one day optimism will become a powerful exchange platform," which are both future-focused statements not allowed under the grant rules.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is categorized as a project but uses "I" indicating it should be an individual.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Tokenization Platforms, User Experience & Adoption
